Indian Air Force Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Agniveervayu Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 18, 2025, 17:37 IST
 Indian Air Force
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 18-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 30,000 to 40,000




FOLLOW

The Indian Air Force has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Agniveervayu Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 12th, Diploma in Mechanical, Electrical, Electronics, and Computer Science Engineering can apply for the Indian Air Force Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Delhi.

Indian Air Force Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Agniveervayu	01	12th, Diploma in Mechanical, Electrical, Electronics, and Computer Science Engineering.

Indian Air Force Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 65 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

Indian Air Force Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

Indian Air Force Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

The application fee

For all candidates: Rs. 100/-.

Indian Air Force Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 30,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 40,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the Indian Air Force Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the Indian Air Force Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	11-08-2025
Closing date	20-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
